analyzed: ṭhapetvā ariya maggam avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā ti
nanu cattāri ariya saccāni vuttāni bhagavatā
dukkha dukkha samudayaḥ dukkha nirodhaḥ dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati
hañci cattāri ariya saccāni vuttāni bhagavatā
dukkha dukkha samudayaḥ dukkha nirodhaḥ dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā

original: Ariyamaggo anicco, so ca na dukkhoti?
analyzed: ariya maggo anicco so ca na dukkho ti

original: Dukkhasamudayo anicco, so ca na dukkhoti?
analyzed: dukkha samudayo anicco so ca na dukkho ti
dukkha samudayo aniccaḥ saḥ ca dukkho ti
ariya maggo aniccaḥ so ca dukkho ti
ṭhapetvā ariya maggam avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā ti
nanu sā dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati

original: Hañci sā dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sā dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā tena vata re vattabbe
ṭhapetvā ariya maggam avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā ti
ṭhapetvā ariya magga nti kathā niṭṭhitā
